name: WINTER GRAB BAG - MENS
description: All you have to do is pick your size and you get 3 random tees from the whole Sleepy Dan catalog. The designs for your grab bag are picked at random and the new ones are included so you never know what you will get... Good luck! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Tonight Is Your Night - Black
description:
Series 3 of the Sleepy Dan line - Paying homage to a famous Dan!  A great line from one of our favorite movies growing up about long lost twins... Love to sing this one!

100% Cotton / Plastisol print makes the shirt sleepy comfortable! Printed satin neck label uses the pillow logo.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Wake & Bake - Mens Yellow
description:
Series 3 of the Sleepy Dan line - Showing some respect to every early morning baker trying to set the tone for the day... Rise & shine, let's get toasted!

100% Cotton / Water based print makes the shirt sleepy comfortable! Printed satin neck label uses the pillow logo.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Wake Up Flatbill Snapback
description:
This charcoal / black flatbill snapback hat is a wool blend. The front and side designs are raised embroidery.

This hat is a limited edition one of 60, we will not be remaking once the hat is sold out. So hurry and get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy Dan extras included with every order.

name: Monster Under The Bed #13
description:
This aqua monster design is #13 of 20 paintings that Sleepy Dan made for the Monster Under The Bed gallery event at Circuit 12 Contemporary in Dallas, TX on May 11th, 2013. The 22inch x 14inch pillow shaped cutouts are acrylic on wood and are all numbered and signed on the back.

Each painting bought, comes with a bunch of extras and a free Sleepy Dan shirt, just email your size! But grab one while they last cause there were only 20 made... You Snooze, You Lose!

name: Ded Ant - Mens Black
description:
The first design of the upcoming Dead Tired line for Sleepy Dan! This one is dedicated to a local skater friend Anthony who's a Zumiez store manager. These shirts were made for his first end of summer Get Ded skate park party!

100% Cotton / Water based print makes the shirt sleepy comfortable! Printed satin neck label uses the pillow logo.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Pillow Fight - MENS CHARCOAL
description:
The Pillow Monster is back for some Valentine's Day revenge! This tonal design is being released in time to order one for your love, of sleep...

100% Cotton / Four color water based print makes the shirt sleepy comfortable! Printed satin neck label uses the pillow logo.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Crew Sweatie - Heather Blue
description:
This tri-blend crew neck sweatshirt is the softest you will ever wear! The Heather Blue material is a Cotton / Poly / Rayon blend, with a water based tonal Navy print, so soft you will never want to take it off... It has a custom neck label and embroidered alarm icon applique at the left sleeve cuff.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Crew Sweatie - Heather Gray
description:
This crew neck sweatshirt was custom made for Sleepy Dan with original details. Custom neck label, embroidered alarm icon applique at sleeve cuff and screen printed logo at front chest.

Cotton / Poly blend material is a Light Heather Gray, cover stitch seams for the V shape expandable neck insert.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: You Snooze - Mens Charcoal
description:
Series 2 of the Sleepy Dan line - You Snooze You Lose is an update to the Wake Up type design from the Series 1 line. This is the tag line of the Sleepy Dan brand, keep workin towards your dreams, never give up!

100% Cotton / Water based print makes the shirt sleepy comfortable! Printed satin neck label uses the pillow logo, then a woven label sewn at left sleeve uses the alarm clock icon.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Pillow Monster - Mens Cyan
description:
This Lightning Strike design was introduced at the Artopia 2011 event hosted by Dallas Observer. This is the first design using the Pillow Monster and Artopia helped bring this character to life like Frankenstein! This cyan shirt was used in the t shirt battle at the event and is a limited edition at only 60 prints.

100% Cotton / four color plastisol chest print with Artopia printed neck label to commemorate the t shirt battle event.

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be reprinting once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.

name: Pillow Case Set
description:
Pillow Case Set comes with a Pillow Logo and your choice of the Alarm Clock design or the Wake Up design, from the Sleepy Dan series 1. The set comes packaged together in a custom printed cardboard box. Water based screen print on soft material so you get a comfy nite sleep!

• 32 inch wide x 20 inch high
• 55% Cotton 45% Poly material

name: Sleepy Dan Fan Pack
description: Sleepy Dan fan packs have a whole bunch of surprises... The sealed fan pack includes the current button design set, a pillow logo sticker and wake up sticker, a pocket note pad with un-ruled pages great for drawing or writing notes, and the plush pillow logo key-chain which makes a great zipper pull!

name: Polo Shirt - Mens Navy
description:
Series 2 of the Sleepy Dan line - Silk wishes it could be as soft and plush as this polo! No more scratchy piques... This 100% Combed Cotton Jersey makes the shirt sleepy comfortable! 

5.3 oz Cotton gives this polo a relaxed fit with luxurious feel. Sleepy Dan woven label with sizing sewn at back neck, embroidered alarm icon applique at front left chest. The no-curl flat-knit collar, three button placket and contrast neck tape make this polo a classic addition to your closet!

Every Sleepy Dan shirt is a limited edition run, we will not be making more once a shirt is sold out. So hurry to get your order in cause... You Snooze, You Lose! Sleepy surprises included with every shirt order.
